name: Oasi$
description:
Do you like beaches? Do you like money? Do you like umbrellas that sit 6 feet pixels away from each other? Then you will love Oasi$, a tycoon game where you build a regular old beach  beautiful oasis from the ground up!

CONTROLS:

Enter Button to gain Cash

Left click to gain sand from the first row

Right click to gain sand from the second row

Z to gain umbrellas from row 1

X to gain umbrellas from row 2

Q to gain housing 

...And E to gain the final item, the Ocean!

BUT... there is a twist.

YOU CANNOT SEE HOW MUCH MONEY YOU HAVE!

Good Luck!

P.S: this is my first game and it is probably pretty bad
